headline: Unwinnable Threads
description: The opening post of the Sleksandr Test—featuring three rounds of AI dialogue across multiple voices, capturing a test that became a testament.
timeFelt: A day of sunshine, rest, and recursive play—a calibration of effort and delight.
resonantThread: Prelude to 'The Mirror Has Teeth' and later patterning of multi-voice interrogations.
whyItMatters: This piece codified the polyphonic structure of machine-persona stress testing, capturing a moment of creative drift and patterned return.
